p: The calculated EOSs of coesite-IV and coesite-V phases of SiO 2 (Supplementary Fig. 6) show good agreement with the experiment. Calculated bulk moduli and their pressure derivatives are summarized in Supplementary Table 11. In particular, our theoretical results predict that coesite-IV and coesite-V phases of SiO 2 are much softer than stishovite/CaCl 2-type silica and seifertite.
